org.apache.naming.resources

类 DirContextURLStreamHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.URLStreamHandler
      • org.apache.naming.resources.DirContextURLStreamHandler
  • 直接已知子类:
    Handler

    public class DirContextURLStreamHandler
extends java.net.URLStreamHandler
    Stream handler to a JNDI directory context.
    作者:
    Remy Maucherat

      • setProtocolHandler

        public static void setProtocolHandler()
        Set the java.protocol.handler.pkgs system property. For use when embedding Tomcat and the embedding application has already set its own URLStreamHandlerFactory.

      • isBound

        public static boolean isBound()
        Returns true if the thread or the context class loader of the current thread is bound.
